description: Enterprise techniques used by Night Dragon, ATT&CK group G0014 v1.0
name: Night Dragon (G0014)

techniques.comment: [Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) sent spearphishing emails containing links to compromised websites where malware was downloaded.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) has performed SQL injection attacks of extranet web servers to gain access.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) used pass-the-hash tools to gain usernames and passwords.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) has dumped account hashes with [Carbanak](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0008) and cracked them with Cain & Abel.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) enticed users to click on links in spearphishing emails to download malware.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) has used several remote administration tools as persistent infiltration channels.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) has used ports 25 and 80 for C2 communications.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) has used compromised VPN accounts to gain access to victim systems.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) has used compromised VPN accounts to gain access to victim systems.

[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) has disabled anti-virus and anti-spyware tools in some instances on the victim’s machines. The actors have also disabled proxy settings to allow direct communication from victims to the Internet.[
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) has copied files to company web servers and subsequently downloaded them.
A [Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) DLL included an XOR-encoded section.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) is known to use software packing in its tools.

techniques.techniqueName: Acquire and/or use 3rd party software services
techniques.comment: [Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) used third party hosting services in the U.S. in an attempt to hide their operations.

techniques.techniqueName: Acquire and/or use 3rd party infrastructure services
techniques.comment: [Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) used servers in China, the U.S., and the Netherlands in an attempt to hide their operations.
[Night Dragon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0014) used privately developed and customized remote access tools.
